gen:link.msg:message: `Provisions` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_Provisions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_Provisions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfProvisionsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
